mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bms.`gw_msg_receiver` mr LEFT JOIN bms.`gw_receiver` r ON r.`receiver_id` = mr.`receiver_id` WHERE r.`learn_id` = #{learnId} AND mr.`mtp_id` = #{mtpId}

where receiver_id = #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
